home.title: Welcome to WiseCookie
home.subtitle: An intelligent machine learning platform for cookie quality prediction and analysis

predict.title: Model Prediction
predict.description: Input grain traits like gluten content, protein content, and grain hardness to get a comprehensive digital score based on ML models.

table.title: Interactive Table
table.description: Browse and analyze existing cookie datasets, supporting filtering by type, similarity search, and various sorting methods.

about.title: About the Model
about.description1: Our prediction model utilizes ensemble learning methods, integrating multiple machine learning algorithms to accurately predict the comprehensive quality score of cookies based on physicochemical characteristics.
about.description2: This platform aims to help food R&D personnel quickly evaluate recipe feasibility, optimize production processes, and improve product development efficiency.
